channel.title: Autocast interface

item.title: Autocast interface
item.dc:creator: @Runecessor Runecessor
item.description:
@Runecessor wrote:

Because I want to get the basics out of the way first. I suggest taking the code from the “Ancient Staff” and re-pasting the code under its original and just change the Staff specific details on the copy to the details of the new staff. If that does not work get back to me and I’ll see what I can do to help you out.

~Sincerely Michael (Lead Developer Of Runecessor)

Read full topic

item.title: Autocast interface
item.dc:creator: @jake645 jake645
item.description:
@jake645 wrote:

I can’t seem to get the autocast interface for my new staff. (it used to be iban staff)

also added it here too

[code=java]if (c.autocastId > 0) {
c.getPA().resetAutocast();
} else {
if (c.playerMagicBook == 1) {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4675 || (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 1409 || (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15486 || (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15040 || (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 6914)))))
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1689);
else
c.sendMessage(“You can’t autocast ancients without an ancient staff.”);
} else if (c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4170) {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 12050);
} else {
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1829);
}
}

			}	[/code]

Read full topic
